column2: I walk in to pick up food and nobody greeting or ask. I tried to tell somone that I come to pick up food. Somone walked to me
column4: could you waiting far away. I'll tell you when it's done" The food was sitting there waiting to be packed
column5: after manager packed the food still siting there without telling me like 10 minutes. Was waiting for food like 20 minutes.. Well
column7: that is why people want to pick up fast and leave.. don't want to try this place !!
